categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Eldra Kaitis, a Force-sensitive Rutian Twi'lek female, was a Padawan of the Jedi Order during the twilight years of the Galactic Republic. Prior to the Invasion of Naboo, she became a prisoner of the Xrexus Cartel. Xev Xrexus, the leader of the Cartel, intended to sell the Padawan to the highest bidder. Darth Maul, the apprentice of the Sith Lord Darth Sidious, endeavored to find Kaitis in order to test his abilities against a Jedi.

During the auction, Jee Kra placing the winning bid but Maul and his hired contingent of bounty hunters ambushed them in their Shekelesh-class freight gunship. Xrexus had secretly sabotaged the ship, forcing them to crash on moon of Drazkel.

They survived the crash, and Maul freed Kaitis to help fight the hunters who were chasing them. After this was done, Maul and Kaitis dueled each other. Despite facing a Sith Lord and being only a Padawan learner, Kaitis engaged Maul without fear and was able to fight him on an even footing before trapping Maul under a pile of rocks with a throw of her lightsaber. Maul survived this attack, however, and killed her with a single strike of his own red blade as she made to finish him.
Maul reflected that Kaitis would have made a good Sith, but killed her to sate his anger and prevent the knowledge of his betrayal from Darth Sidious from spreading.
Maul later used her name in the Coruscant Underworld to hire the Force-sensitive thief Zek Peiro before killing him.
Eldra Kaitis was created for Marvel Comics' Star Wars: Darth Maul comic series.
